cybermarket|markets|mktregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) uniquely identifying a specific market entry (e.g., 'MKT-AlphaBay').
cybermarket|markets|mktdenom: A descriptive name or label for the dark market (e.g., 'AlphaBay', 'DreamMarket').
cybermarket|markets|mktclass: An enum (MktClass_enum) denoting the market's general class (Forum, Service, Marketplace, Exchange).
cybermarket|markets|mktspan: An INT representing how many days this market has been active (e.g., 345).
cybermarket|markets|sizecluster: An enum (SizeCluster_enum) labeling market size (Mega, Medium, Large, Small).
cybermarket|markets|dlyflow: A BIGINT indicating daily transaction volume (e.g., 123456).
cybermarket|markets|mthactive: A BIGINT counting monthly active users on the market (e.g., 500000).
cybermarket|markets|vendcount: An INT tally of how many vendors operate in this market (e.g., 15000).
cybermarket|markets|buycount: An INT count of buyer accounts on this market (e.g., 100000).
cybermarket|markets|listtotal: A BIGINT total number of product or service listings (e.g., 250000).
cybermarket|markets|interscore: A NUMERIC(6,3) (0–999.999) scoring the market's interaction or activity level (e.g., 458.234).
cybermarket|markets|esccomprate: A NUMERIC(5,3) (0–999.999) measuring escrow completion rate (e.g., 95.745).
cybermarket|vendors|vendregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) uniquely identifying a vendor (e.g., 'VEND-Abc123').
cybermarket|vendors|vendspan: An INT indicating how many days the vendor has been active (e.g., 120).
cybermarket|vendors|vendrate: A NUMERIC(4,2) (0–99.99) rating for the vendor based on reviews (e.g., 92.75).
cybermarket|vendors|vendtxcount: An INT total number of completed transactions for the vendor (e.g., 3500).
cybermarket|vendors|vendsucccount: An INT number of undisputed or successful transactions (e.g., 3400).
cybermarket|vendors|venddisputecount: An INT number of disputed transactions (e.g., 100).
cybermarket|vendors|vendplacecount: A SMALLINT representing how many listings the vendor has created (e.g., 45).
cybermarket|vendors|vendpaymethods: A SMALLINT showing how many payment methods the vendor accepts (e.g., 3).
cybermarket|vendors|vendchecklvl: An enum (VendCheckLvl_enum) describing the vendor’s verification tier (Basic, Advanced, Premium).
cybermarket|vendors|vendlastmoment: A DATE recording the vendor's last activity (e.g., '2025-03-15').
cybermarket|vendors|mktref: FK referencing Markets(MktRegistry) linking this vendor to a specific market.
cybermarket|buyers|buyregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) for a buyer record (e.g., 'BUY-xyz890').
cybermarket|buyers|buyspan: An INT specifying how many days the buyer has been active (e.g., 60).
cybermarket|buyers|buytxtally: A SMALLINT counting how many purchases/transactions the buyer made (e.g., 25).
cybermarket|buyers|buyspending: An enum (BuySpending_enum) describing spending pattern (Variable, High, Low, Medium).
cybermarket|buyers|buyfreqcat: An enum (BuyFreqCat_enum) labeling purchase frequency (Heavy, Regular, One-time, Occasional).
cybermarket|buyers|buychecklvl: An enum (BuyCheckLvl_enum) specifying buyer verification level (Advanced, Basic).
cybermarket|buyers|buyriskrate: A NUMERIC(5,2) measure of fraud or chargeback risk for this buyer (e.g., 82.50).
cybermarket|buyers|mktref: FK referencing Markets(MktRegistry), linking buyer to its main or home market.
cybermarket|buyers|vendref: FK referencing Vendors(VendRegistry), if the buyer is directly associated with a vendor.
cybermarket|products|prodregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) for each product listing (e.g., 'PROD-12345').
cybermarket|products|prodtheme: An enum (ProdTheme_enum) for the product's main category (Digital, Data, Service, Physical).
cybermarket|products|prodsubcat: An enum (ProdSubcat_enum) specifying the product subcategory (Type_A, Type_B, Type_C, Type_D).
cybermarket|products|prodlistdays: An INT showing how many days the listing has been on the market (e.g., 14).
cybermarket|products|prodpriceusd: A NUMERIC(10,2) price of the product in USD (e.g., 199.99).
cybermarket|products|vendref: FK referencing Vendors(VendRegistry) indicating which vendor offers this product.
cybermarket|products|buyref: FK referencing Buyers(BuyRegistry), if reserved or linked to a specific buyer.
cybermarket|transactions|rectag: A unique VARCHAR(30) record ID for external references (e.g., 'Record-90876').
cybermarket|transactions|eventstamp: A TIMESTAMP capturing the transaction creation or logging time (e.g., '2025-03-01 12:00:00').
cybermarket|transactions|paymethod: An enum (PayMethod_enum) naming the payment type (Crypto_A, Crypto_B, Crypto_C, Token).
cybermarket|transactions|payamtusd: A NUMERIC(14,2) capturing the transaction’s total payment amount in USD (e.g., 10000.00).
cybermarket|transactions|txfeeusd: A NUMERIC(10,2) for fees in USD (e.g., 15.50).
cybermarket|transactions|escrowused: An enum (EscrowUsed_enum) indicating if escrow was used (Yes, No).
cybermarket|transactions|escrowhrs: A SMALLINT for how many hours funds remain in escrow (e.g., 72).
cybermarket|transactions|multisigflag: An enum (MultiSigFlag_enum) capturing whether multi-signature was enabled (Yes, No).
cybermarket|transactions|txstatus: An enum (TxStatus_enum) showing transaction status (Pending, Cancelled, Completed, Disputed).
cybermarket|transactions|txfinishhrs: A NUMERIC(5,2) measuring how many hours until completion (e.g., 48.75).
cybermarket|transactions|shipmethod: An enum (ShipMethod_enum) describing delivery approach (Express, Standard, Custom, Digital).
cybermarket|transactions|shipregionsrc: An enum (ShipRegionSrc_enum) for the source region (Region_A, Region_B, Region_C, Unknown).
cybermarket|transactions|shipregiondst: An enum (ShipRegionDst_enum) for the destination region (Region_X, Region_Y, Region_Z, Unknown).
cybermarket|transactions|crossborderflag: An enum (CrossBorderFlag_enum) stating if it's an international transaction (Yes, No).
cybermarket|transactions|routecomplexity: An enum (RouteComplexity_enum) describing shipping route complexity (Complex, Medium, Simple).
cybermarket|transactions|mktref: FK referencing Markets(MktRegistry). Identifies which market the transaction occurred on.
cybermarket|transactions|prodref: FK referencing Products(ProdRegistry). Ties transaction to a product listing.
cybermarket|transactions|buyref: FK referencing Buyers(BuyRegistry). Specifies the buyer who initiated the transaction.
cybermarket|communication|commregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) for a communication/log record (e.g., 'COMM-98765').
cybermarket|communication|iptally: A SMALLINT counting distinct IP addresses involved (e.g., 5).
cybermarket|communication|tornodecount: A SMALLINT counting how many TOR nodes/relays were detected (e.g., 2).
cybermarket|communication|vpnflag: An enum (VpnFlag_enum) indicating VPN usage (Yes, No, Suspected).
cybermarket|communication|brwsrunique: A NUMERIC(6,3) measuring browser fingerprint uniqueness (e.g., 592.223).
cybermarket|communication|connpatscore: A NUMERIC(5,2) rating suspicious connection patterns (e.g., 75.50).
cybermarket|communication|encryptmethod: An enum (EncryptMethod_enum) for encryption use (Custom, Standard, Enhanced).
cybermarket|communication|commchannel: An enum (CommChannel_enum) describing the channel (Mixed, External, Internal).
cybermarket|communication|msgtally: A SMALLINT total messages in the session (e.g., 45).
cybermarket|communication|commfreq: An enum (CommFreq_enum) describing communication frequency (Low, Medium, High).
cybermarket|communication|langpattern: An enum (LangPattern_enum) describing language usage (Variable, Suspicious, Consistent).
cybermarket|communication|keymatchcount: A SMALLINT counting cryptographic or keyword matches (e.g., 3).
cybermarket|communication|riskindiccount: A SMALLINT tally of identified risk indicators or flags (e.g., 5).
cybermarket|communication|txref: FK referencing Transactions(TxRegistry) if communication is tied to a transaction.
cybermarket|communication|prodref: FK referencing Products(ProdRegistry) if communication pertains to a product listing.
cybermarket|riskanalysis|riskregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) for a risk analysis record (e.g., 'RA-abc123').
cybermarket|riskanalysis|moneyrisk: An enum (RiskLevel_enum) for money laundering risk (Low, Medium, High, Unknown).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|linkedtxcount: A SMALLINT counting related or linked transactions (e.g., 7).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|txchainlen: A SMALLINT measuring transaction chain length (e.g., 4).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|wallage: An INT indicating wallet age in days (e.g., 200).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|wallbalusd: A NUMERIC(15,2) approximate wallet balance in USD (e.g., 12500.00).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|profilecomplete: A NUMERIC(4,1) (0–99.9) indicating completeness of associated profile data (e.g., 85.7).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|idverifyscore: A NUMERIC(4,1) (0–99.9) for identity verification confidence (e.g., 40.2).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|feedbackauthsco: A NUMERIC(4,1) (0–99.9) rating authenticity of feedback (e.g., 92.3).
cybermarket|riskanalysis|commref: FK referencing Communication(CommRegistry). Links risk analysis to communication logs.
cybermarket|riskanalysis|txref: FK referencing Transactions(TxRegistry). Ties the analysis to a transaction chain or record.
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|secmonreg: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) for a security monitoring record (e.g., 'SM-xyz123').
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|securitya: An enum (SecurityAuditStatus_enum) describing the system's last security audit result (Warning, Pass, Fail).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|securitym: An INT listing how many security measures are in place (e.g., 8).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|encryptio: An enum (EncryptionStrength_enum) describing encryption (Strong, Military-grade, Standard).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|authentic: An enum (AuthenticationMethod_enum) used for system auth (Basic, 2FA, Multi-factor).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|dataprote: An enum (DataProtectionLevel_enum) reflecting data handling (Maximum, Enhanced, Basic).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|alertsev: An enum (AlertSev_enum) for alert severity (Low, Medium, High, Critical).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|alertcate: An enum (AlertCategory_enum) describing alert focus (Pattern, Transaction, Behavior, Security).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|alertconf: A NUMERIC(4,2) (0–99.99) for confidence in each alert (e.g., 85.20).
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|riskref: FK referencing RiskAnalysis(RiskRegistry). Links monitoring data to a risk profile.
cybermarket|securitymonitoring|commref: FK referencing Communication(CommRegistry) if relevant security logs exist.
cybermarket|investigation|investregistry: Primary key (VARCHAR(30)) for an investigation record (e.g., 'INV-abc123').
cybermarket|investigation|investstat: An enum (InvestStat_enum) for investigation status (Monitoring, Closed, Active).
cybermarket|investigation|lawinterest: An enum (RiskLevel_enum) for law enforcement interest (Low, Medium, High, Unknown).
cybermarket|investigation|regrisklvl: An enum (RiskLevel_enum) describing regulatory risk (Low, Medium, High, Unknown).
cybermarket|investigation|compliancescor: A NUMERIC(4,2) (0–99.99) measuring how compliant the subject is (e.g., 75.50).
cybermarket|investigation|investpriority: An enum (InvestPriority_enum) for priority (Low, Medium, High).
cybermarket|investigation|resptimemins: An INT for average response time in minutes (e.g., 45).
cybermarket|investigation|escalationleve: An enum (EscalationLevel_enum) describing how far it's escalated (Level1, Level2, Level3).
cybermarket|investigation|casestatus: An enum (CaseStatus_enum) describing the case state (New, In Progress, Resolved, Closed).
cybermarket|investigation|resolutiontime: A SMALLINT for hours from case open to resolution (e.g., 72).
cybermarket|investigation|actiontaken: An enum (ActionTaken_enum) describing final actions (Termination, Warning, Restriction).
cybermarket|investigation|followuprequir: An enum (FollowupRequired_enum) (Yes, No) for follow-up necessity.
cybermarket|investigation|reviewfrequenc: An enum (ReviewFrequency_enum) for re-check intervals (Weekly, Monthly, Daily).
cybermarket|investigation|nextreviewdate: A DATE specifying the next scheduled review (e.g., '2025-06-01').
cybermarket|investigation|notescount: A SMALLINT tally of internal notes on the case (e.g., 4).
cybermarket|investigation|dataretentions: An enum (DataRetentionStatus_enum) describing how data is stored (Deleted, Active, Archived).
cybermarket|investigation|lastupdated: A TIMESTAMP capturing last update time (e.g., '2025-03-30 14:00:00').
cybermarket|investigation|updatefrequenc: An INT for how often the case is updated or reviewed automatically (e.g., 24).
cybermarket|investigation|secref: FK referencing SecurityMonitoring(SecMonRegistry). Ties the investigation to security data.
cybermarket|investigation|riskref: FK referencing RiskAnalysis(RiskRegistry). Associates the investigation with a risk record.

cybermarket|markets|market_status_reputa.column_meaning: JSONB column. Consolidated information regarding the market's operational status, community reputation, trust level, and compliance/enforcement metrics.

fields_meaning.status: An enum (MarketStatus_enum) capturing the market's status (Active, Under Investigation, Suspended, Closed).
fields_meaning.reputation_score: A NUMERIC(6,3) reputation or community rating (0.000–999.999).
fields_meaning.trust_level: An enum (RiskLevel_enum) describing overall trust/risk level (Low, Medium, High, Unknown).
fields_meaning.dispute_resolution_score: A NUMERIC(4,1) (0–99.9) describing effectiveness of dispute resolution (e.g., 8.7).

compliance_metrics.rule_break_count: A SMALLINT counting known rule or TOS violations (e.g., 27).
compliance_metrics.warning_count: A SMALLINT tallying warnings issued to market participants (e.g., 53).
compliance_metrics.penalty_count: A SMALLINT for how many penalties or bans were enforced (e.g., 10).
compliance_metrics.restriction_level: An enum (AccountRestrictionLevel_enum) stating the restriction extent (Full, Partial).

cybermarket|securitymonitoring|threat_an.column_meaning: JSONB column. A collection of scores related to threat intelligence integration, detection capabilities, anonymity assessment, and analytical pattern matching from security monitoring.

fields_meaning.threat_intelligence_score: A NUMERIC(5,2) measuring usage of threat intel (e.g., 85.20).
fields_meaning.detection_evasion_score: A NUMERIC(5,2) for how well the system evades detection (e.g., 60.15).
fields_meaning.anonymity_level: An enum (AnonLevel_enum) describing anonymity (Low, Medium, High).
fields_meaning.traceability_score: A NUMERIC(5,3) (0–999.999) rating how traceable user actions are (e.g., 245.671).
fields_meaning.behavioral_analysis_score: A NUMERIC(5,2) rating behavior-based threat detection (e.g., 88.25).

cybermarket|riskanalysis|network_behavio.column_meaning: JSONB column. Stores scores derived from analyzing network structure, transaction patterns, temporal activity, geographic distribution, and behavioral consistency associated with the risk profile.

fields_meaning.transaction_pattern_category: An enum (TxPatternCat_enum) describing transaction patterns (High-risk, Suspicious, Normal).

network_analysis.connection_diversity: A NUMERIC(6,2) measuring diversity of connections (e.g., 78.45).

behavioral_analysis.behavior_consistency_score: A NUMERIC(5,2) consistency of behavior across time (e.g., 70.90).
